title: Pixel 4a froze up with white screen and multicolor G. Could not switch off or restart. Android 11
content: Pixel 4a froze up with white screen and multicolor G. Could not switch off or restart. Running Android 11. Tried help desk, gave up after waiting for a chat response for over a hour, despite being #1 in line. Endrd up holding down the power button and volume down at same time, and switching off while in safe mode. No problems since.
